title: The Sire de Maletroits Door Sires hands

content.question: How does the detailed description of the Sire de Malétroit’s hands toward the middle of the second paragraph (“Age, probably . . . martyr”) serve to illuminate his character?

choices.label: His soft hands convey his childlike innocence and warm hospitality.
The prayerlike position of his hands indicates his devout piety.
His long and refined fingers demonstrate his artistic endeavors.
The position of his hands is at odds with his malevolent gaze.

content.answer: The position of his hands is at odds with his malevolent gaze.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
